greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(n) such that 9^m == 1 mod n, or 0 if no such number exists.
program: (PARI) a(n) = {for (i = 1, eulerphi(n), if ((9^i % n) == 1, return(i));); return (0);} \\_Michel Marcus_, Jul 31 2013
(MAGMA) [0] cat [Modorder(9, n): n in [2..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 01 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
